law.catch_line: No right of action on champertous contract.
law.text: Neither party to any contract made in violation of any of the provisions of KRS 372.060 to 372.120 shall have any right of action thereon.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 216.
